text: "Ordinary Man" is a 2020 song by Ozzy Osbourne featuring Elton John. It is the title track to Osbourne's 20th studio album Ordinary Man. It also features Slash, Duff McKagan and Chad Smith and went to number 8 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs chart. ==References== Category:2020 songs Category:2020s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Elton John songs Category:Ozzy Osbourne songs
title: Ordinary Man (Ozzy Osbourne song)
